abstract: Edmund Yazzie, third-term Navajo Nation lawmaker, is also drummer for heavy metal band Testify; genre has been popular among young Navajo since at least 1990s, and band is one of many that exist on Native American reservations across the country; many bands use term 'Rez Metal' to identify themselves.
lead_paragraph: As a veteran lawmaker on the Navajo reservation, Edmund Yazzie is an integral part of the establishment. He is also the drummer for the metal band Testify.
snippet: As a veteran lawmaker on the Navajo reservation, Edmund Yazzie is an integral part of the establishment. He is also the drummer for the metal band Testify.

headline.main: Looking to Uplift, With Navajo ‘Rez Metal’
headline.print_headline: Looking to Uplift, With Navajo ‘Rez Metal’
